designSystemProfile.name: Futuristic Gaming UI
designSystemProfile.description: A design system for a modern, dark-themed gaming interface with clean lines, rounded corners, and a focus on clarity.

style.overallFeel: The UI combines a dark, immersive background with bright, glowing accent colors and soft, rounded components to create a high-tech yet approachable feel.

background.description: A very dark, deep desaturated blue, used for the main application background.

component.description: Components use either a light, off-white with high transparency or a dark gray-blue, creating a layered effect.

accent.description: A vibrant blue for interactive elements, highlights, and progress indicators. A secondary warm color (yellow/orange) is used for tags or secondary status.

text.description: Primary text is off-white for readability. Secondary text is a muted gray for labels and less critical information. Text on colored buttons is pure white.

border.description: Borders are subtle or non-existent, except for highlighting selected or active items.

principles: Use generous, consistent whitespace between elements and components to reduce cognitive load.
Align elements logically within a grid to create a sense of order.
Employ a multi-column structure, often with a main content area and a sidebar.

card.description: The primary container for content modules. Uses soft shadows for depth.

button.description: Primary call-to-action buttons are solid, bright, and inviting.

iconButton.description: Subtle, circular buttons for secondary actions.

iconography.description: Icons are minimalist, clean, and purely functional. They should not be ornate.

shadows.description: Shadows are used to lift components off the background, creating a sense of depth and hierarchy.

glow.type: Subtle outer glow on interactive or highlighted elements
